body_html: Currently https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/_functions/pointwise.py#L57-L70 is being called, which is 4 kernels in backwards. In the non-fused non-cudnn lstm cell I count going from 44 kernel calls in backward to 31 kernel calls.
body_text: Currently https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/_functions/pointwise.py#L57-L70 is being called, which is 4 kernels in backwards. In the non-fused non-cudnn lstm cell I count going from 44 kernel calls in backward to 31 kernel calls.
body: Currently https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/autograd/_functions/pointwise.py#L57-L70 is being called, which is 4 kernels in backwards. In the non-fused non-cudnn lstm cell I count going from 44 kernel calls in backward to 31 kernel calls.
